title: Mango chicken salad
ingredients: ['1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 tsp grated fresh root ginger', '1 tbsp light soy sauce', '2 tsp sunflower oil', '2 skinless boneless chicken breasts (fillets), about 170 g (6 oz) each', '800 g (1¾ lb) new potatoes, scrubbed', '2 large sprigs of fresh mint', '125 g (4½ oz) asparagus spears', '1 ripe mango, peeled and sliced', '150 g (5½ oz) mixed baby salad leaves, such as spinach, red chard, and cos and Lollo Rosso lettuces', 'Fresh orange dressing', '½ tsp finely grated orange zest', '1 tbsp orange juice', '1 tsp Dijon mustard', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 tbsp walnut oil', 'salt and pepper']
